summary:
Textures pack for -FemFeet - Female Foot Replacement Mod - by Phygit
and Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- to use them together.
____________________________________________________________
descriptionHtml:
[b]Here is texture pack for  -FemFeet - Female Foot Replacement Mod - by Phygit
and Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- to use them together.[/b]

[color=gold][b]REQUARED[/b][/color]
______________________________________________________________________
It contains texture maps ( to match original Calientes work)
           [b]****  Calientes mod required   ****[/b]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
And normal maps and texture for -FemFeet - Female Foot Replacement Mod - by Phygit
                [b]*** Phygit mod required ***[/b]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666]FemFeet[/url]

Also Clear Hands - beta mod - work in progress.
It takes a lot of time to make this 2 mods work together.

[color=gold][b]UPDATES[/b][/color]
_________________________________________________________________________
_Update 1
Slim body with feet of original Caliente mod ( original mods required)
_Update 2
Nail color variations in optional files (overwrite original texture with color you choose)
Sadly all womans get same colors. Looks like only one nail designer exist somwhere in Riften catacombs XD.
_Update 4 
Improved dds textures ( Thanks to XunAmarox for Fix and nails texture! )
New nail texture. All versions in one pack. Default is natural color.
_Update 5 Version 1.0
Now with new Phygit \"FemFeet_v2p2_121811\" normals and textures
\"Falmer Boots\" replacement mesh supported
Latest Caliente Slim Body Edition V0-2-1 supported
Caliente Vanilla Edition v0.2 textures are compatible with Caliente\'s Body Mod Big Bottom Edition v0.2.
All versions Pubic hair options (optional files)
All versions Color variations (optional files)
All Versions Clear Hands (New 2K texure) -WIP beta
_______________________________________________________________________________
4 versions of new feets avialable:
1. For Regular Calientes Female Body Mod BBE v0_2
2. Calientes Female Body Mod BBE v0_2 _ Muscle edition ( with a bit muscular look)
fitness mostly :D
3. Calientes Female Body Mod BBE v0_2 _ Muscle edition with pubic hair (also normal maps for pubic hair)
4. Caliente Female Body Mod Slim Body Edition v0-2-1

[color=gold][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color]
_______________________________________________________________________________
[b]First of all - download and install this 2 mods
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-[/url]
choose from calientes mod variations.
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666]FemFeet[/url]
install new feet mesh  from  Phygit.
Then Download this mod, Unpack and copy version you like to your Data folder with overwrite.[/b]

This files replace original Calientes textures to work with new feet.
But since Author upload textures for custom mode i use them as base.

[color=gold][b]COMPATIBLE MODS[/b][/color]
_______________________________________________________________
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4254]Skeuomorph CBBE Slim V2 Nethers - Texture variations for Slim body[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4341]Improved Wedding Sandals by Savage Hammer[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4473]Improved Foot Wraps for females by Savage Hammer[/url]

[color=gold][b]TO DO[/b][/color]
Non Human textures and normals.

[color=gold][b]FAQ[/b][/color]
Q: I have Ugly feets...  I have weird warped vanilla feet...
A:  looks like you don\'t install FemFeet (meshes only) from http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3666 
follow instructions for Phygit mod.
Q: Nipples are huge...
A:  If nipples huge - it means you dont have CBBE v2 body mesh instaled. 
 from http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
___________________________________________________________________
[color=gold][b]THANKS TO[/b][/color]
1 Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- As base version
2 FemFeet - Female Foot Replacement Mod - by Phygit
3 Denariel texture .
4 shootmefr for muscular mod Idea.
5  XunAmarox  for help and textures.
6 Bethesda for great game!
author: aknot
